mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT C SET CHAT_COUNT = CHAT_COUNT + 1 WHERE C.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND CHAT_WRITE_DATE > COALESCE( (SELECT CHAT_CONTECT_DATE FROM CHAT_ROOM CR WHERE CR.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CR.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo}), TO_DATE('1970-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT VALUES( SEQ_CHAT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{chatContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{memberNo}, #{groupNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT MG.GROUP_NO, G.GROUP_NAME, ( ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_GROUP MG2 WHERE MG2.GROUP_NO = MG.GROUP_NO ) - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT C WHERE C.GROUP_NO = MG.GROUP_NO AND CHAT_WRITE_DATE > NVL((SELECT CHAT_CONTECT_DATE FROM CHAT_ROOM CR WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CR.GROUP_NO = MG.GROUP_NO), TO_DATE('1970-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) ) ) AS "UNREAD_COUNT" FROM MEMBER_GROUP MG LEFT JOIN "GROUP" G ON (MG.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) WHERE MG.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT GROUP_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE MEMBER_NO = 20 ORDER BY CHAT_CONTECT_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT CHAT_NO, CHAT_CONTENT,
CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE - CHAT_WRITE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (CURRENT_DATE - CHAT_WRITE_DATE) *60 *60 *24 ) || '초 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - CHAT_WRITE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (CURRENT_DATE - CHAT_WRITE_DATE) *60 *24 ) || '분 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - CHAT_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (CURRENT_DATE - CHAT_WRITE_DATE) *24 ) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(CHAT_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
END AS "CHAT_WRITE_DATE",
( ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_GROUP MG2 WHERE MG2.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} ) - ( C.CHAT_COUNT ) ) AS "CHAT_COUNT", MEMBER_NO, (SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) AS "MEMBER_NICKNAME", (SELECT MEMBER_IMG FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) AS "MEMBER_PROFILE_URL", GROUP_NO FROM CHAT C WHERE GROUP_NO= #{groupNo} ORDER BY CHAT_NO ASC
